title: Snapdeal #DiwaliDilKiDealWali first festive sale: ‘Electronics Monday’ offer to be available on October 12
text:
Other Articles Consumers to splurge $8 bn on e-commerce this festive season: Assocham Vodafone group CEO Vittorio Colao to call on Arun Jaitley, PM Narendra Modi this week Freecharge to invest Rs 1,000 cr on marketing, promotions this year Snapdeal announced a special ‘Electronics Monday’ offer to be available on October 12 in order to contend with Flipkart ’s ‘Big Billion Days’ and Amazon ‘Great Indian Festive Sale’. Flipkart and amazon discount offers are set to run from October 13 to October 17.
With a hashtag that reads #DiwaliDilKiDealWali, Snapdeal kickstarts its first festive sale and customers can expect a few more special Monday sales in the coming weeks.
As the festive season knocks the door, virtual market’s major players have pulled up their shocks to stand in the market. On Monday, one can expect discounts across personal devices, home appliances and other electronic devices on Snapdeal. Deals are available on mobiles, tablets, laptops and accessories, appliances, TVs and cameras also. Snapdeal also offers 100 lucky customers prizes such as earphones, headphones, memory card, power bank and selfie sticks.
The Yu Yunique will be exclusively available at the open Snapdeal’s ‘Electronics Monday’ sale. The company announced that the buyers don’t need to do any kind of registration to avail the offers.
Snapdeal has also come up with some quick tips to ensure a creaseless shopping experience. The company claims to have invested $100 million for ramping up delivery times. Officials, also said that with this open sale, they are targeting to sell almost 5 lakh smartphones by Diwali which would certainly make them the only online handset brand in India to sell such a large number of smartphone units in this festival season.
It must be noted that last year, such sales saw explosion of orders when Flipkart first initiated the same in the year.
